name: Favstay Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a vacation home rental platform designed to help people to list, find, and book accommodations completely. The company's platform offers a curated list of a wide variety of accommodations, enabling users to find rent hotels and rooms from local hosts.
one_liner: Operator of a vacation home rental platform designed to help people to list, find, and book accommodations completely. The company's platform offers a curated list of a wide variety of accommodations, enabling users to find rent hotels and rooms from local hosts.
